results.message: A variável "err" está declarada, mas nunca é usada

Este método assíncrono não possui operadores 'await' e será executado de modo síncrono. É recomendável o uso do operador 'await' para aguardar chamadas à API desbloqueadas ou do operador 'await Task.Run(...)' para realizar um trabalho associado à CPU em um thread em segundo plano.
A variável "err" está declarada, mas nunca é usada

CS0168.shortDescription: A variável foi declarada, mas nunca foi usada

CS1591.shortDescription: O comentário XML ausente não foi encontrado para o tipo ou membro visível publicamente
CS1591.fullDescription: A opção de compilador /doc foi especificada, mas um ou mais construtores não tinha comentários.

CS1998.shortDescription: O método assíncrono não possui operadores 'await' e será executado de forma síncrona

S108.shortDescription: Nested blocks of code should not be left empty
S108.fullDescription: An empty code block is confusing. It will require some effort from maintainers to determine if it is intentional or indicates the implementation is incomplete.

S1118.shortDescription: Utility classes should not have public constructors
S1118.fullDescription: Whenever there are portions of code that are duplicated and do not depend on the state of their container class, they can be centralized inside a "utility class". A utility class is a class that only has static members, hence it should not be instantiated.

S125.shortDescription: Sections of code should not be commented out
S125.fullDescription: Commented-out code distracts the focus from the actual executed code. It creates a noise that increases maintenance code. And because it is never executed, it quickly becomes out of date and invalid.

S2068.fullDescription: Because it is easy to extract strings from an application source code or binary, credentials should not be hard-coded. This is particularly true for applications that are distributed or that are open-source.

S2486.shortDescription: Generic exceptions should not be ignored
S2486.fullDescription: When exceptions occur, it is usually a bad idea to simply ignore them. Instead, it is better to handle them properly, or at least to log them.

S3063.fullDescription: StringBuilder instances that never build a string clutter the code and worse are a drag on performance. Either they should be removed, or the missing ToString() call should be added.

S4487.fullDescription: Private fields which are written but never read are a case of "dead store". Changing the value of such a field is useless and most probably indicates an error in the code.
